actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income a certain portion of governmental pensions based on services not covered under the Social Security system.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income amounts received under a government pension that are not attributable to services covered under the social security system. Limits such exclusion to the maximum individual social security benefit, one and one-half times such amount for joint returns, or three-fourths of such amount for married individuals filing separately.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income a certain portion of governmental pensions based on services not covered under the Social Security system.
